intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Kris... The final battle is nigh. Medeus awaits us up ahead. It won't be an easy battle... I dare not imagine how many of us will be left standing at the end... Either way, the fate of this world rests on our hands...

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: Sire... Worry not, sire. We will emerge victorious. That's what the fortune-teller said.

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: When I was a child, I asked our village's fortune-teller for a reading... The old lady held the palm of my hand, and said to me... "Ah, your fate is clear to me, child."

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: She said that I would "grow up to be a legendary hero..."

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: She said that I would "live out my life quietly..."

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: She said that I would "follow my calling like an arrow..."

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: She said that I would "devote my life to the service of others..."

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: She said that I would "be stupidly rich and famous..."

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Oh...? I can imagine that happening...

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: And she said that I'd live until I was a hundred years old...!

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: 'Til a hundred...? That is an awfully long time... Oh, I see...! If the fortune-teller was right, then...

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: Then we are definitely walking out of this hall victorious. I'm not quite that old yet... So, rest easy, sire.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Haha, you're quite right. I... feel much calmer now. Thank you, Kris...

battle.speaker: Elice
battle.line: Forgive me, Marth... I've been such a burden.

battle.speaker: Nyna
battle.line: We're all safe now. We're free of the Shadow Dragon's power.

battle.speaker: Lena
battle.line: We will heal the wounded, so that no one else shall die...

battle.speaker: Kris
battle.line: Sire, good news. The princesses have come back to us. Your kindness has saved their souls.

battle.speaker: Marth
battle.line: Thank goodness. I'm too happy for words. I suppose some battles require sacrifice... But that matters not... I won't give up--not now, not ever! Together, we will win this battle!

battle.speaker: Medeus
battle.line: YOU PRESUMPTUOUS HUMANS... HOW DARE YOU--!

battle.speaker: Marth
battle.line: Shadow Dragon Medeus! Now, nothing stands between this blade and you. Come, let's settle this!

recruit-talk.speaker: Julian
recruit-talk.line: Lena, snap out of it! C'mon, it's me! Julian! What's wrong with you, Lena? I know I'm a good-for-nothing scoundrel, but for you, I'd do anything. I don't want anything else-- I just want to see your smile again. Hey, Lena; could you smile for me? Please...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lena
recruit-talk.line: Oh... Julian...? You came. I knew you'd find me. I knew it. That's why, I could continue struggling in the darkness of my soul... Julian, I'm sorry. I've always been a bother to you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Julian
recruit-talk.line: Are you kiddin' me, Lena...? I'm just happy to hear your voice again.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lena
recruit-talk.line: Julian, there's something I'd like very much. Will you listen?

recruit-talk.speaker: Julian
recruit-talk.line: Huh? Sure, Lena, hit me. So long as it's within my power...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lena
recruit-talk.line: Could you call me... "honey"? You're always "Lena" this and "Lena" that. You speak as though we're barely friends-- and I don't like that feeling. That just won't do, especially not after we settle down together in Macedon.

recruit-talk.speaker: Julian
recruit-talk.line: Huh? ...What're you talking about, Lena...? Er... I mean... H-honey... Don't tell you and I are gonna...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lena
recruit-talk.line: Uh-huh... I'm sure God will forgive me. After all, you... You mean the world to me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Minerva
recruit-talk.line: Maria! Please, wake up! It's me, Minerva! What's happened to you?! Get a hold of yourself.

recruit-talk.speaker: Maria
recruit-talk.line: Unh... Ah... Minerva... A-ahhhhhh! Medeus is...

recruit-talk.speaker: Minerva
recruit-talk.line: Shh. It's alright now. Everything's going to be okay. I'm so sorry, Maria. I've left you alone for so long...

recruit-talk.speaker: Maria
recruit-talk.line: Minerva... I was scared... I was so scared... Oh! How is Michalis? I think he fought Gharnef to save me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Minerva
recruit-talk.line: Michalis... is fine. Don't worry, Maria.

recruit-talk.speaker: Maria
recruit-talk.line: Really? Then, once we go home, we'll be together again just like before? I'm so glad, Minerva! Oh, I hope we can see him soon.

recruit-talk.speaker: Minerva
recruit-talk.line: Maria......

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: Ahh... I've done something terrible. I was too foolish... I hurt Hardin... I drove him to despair.

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: My queen... Prince Marth has ended Hardin's suffering. The Emperor loved you till the very end. He was sorry for what he'd done to you. It's alright now. You need not worry. It was all just a bad dream...

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: ...... Who......? Oh...! You're... Camus...?! Camus!! Why... Why are you... This is a dream, isn't it?

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: Nngh! ...My queen... You are mistaken... I am Sirius, a soldier of the allied forces. I know not of this Camus...

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: Sirius...?! ...It can't be... No! You're wrong!! You're...

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: Please, calm yourself; you must be exhausted. I must depart soon. Queen Nyna, listen to me... You should head to Prince Marth.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: You... Where are you going?

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: I must go to my country. There's... someone waiting for me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: Is... Is that so...? I see... Sirius... Thank you. I am most grateful.

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: ...Forgive me...

recruit-talk.speaker: Nyna
recruit-talk.line: Pardon...?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Sirius
recruit-talk.line: No... It is nothing... Now, Queen Nyna; go!

recruit-talk.speaker: Merric
recruit-talk.line: Princess Elice! It's me, Merric. Snap out out of it! I--I studied magic ferociously, all so that I could protect you... I'm sorry... I failed. I couldn't be by your side, when you needed me most. Elice... Please. Please open your eyes!

recruit-talk.speaker: Elice
recruit-talk.line: Merric...? ...Ah! Oh, Merric! Help me... Gharnef is... I'm so frightened... Please help me!

recruit-talk.speaker: Merric
recruit-talk.line: Elice! Thank goodness, you've come back! It's alright now. I'm here, so... Oh... but Prince Marth is... Everyone's watching, so we can't... Oh well... *ahem* Elice, I'll never leave your side again. No matter what may come between us... Never again shall I abandon you!

boss.speaker: Medeus
boss.line: I HAVE... REVIVED... FOOLISH HUMANS... I WILL LEAVE... NONE ALIVE...

boss.speaker: Medeus
boss.line: GWAH...! WHY......? WHY... HAVE I... BEEN DEFEATED... SO EASILY...? IS THIS... THE POWER... ...OF NAGA'S... BINDING SHIELD...? KNOW THIS, HUMANS... THIS LIGHT IS ONLY A BRIEF RESPITE... SO LONG AS EVIL LURKS WITHIN THE HEARTS OF MAN... SHOULD THIS ACCURSED SHIELD BE LOST, WE SHALL RISE FROM THE DEPTHS OF HELL... DO NOT... EVER FORGET...

boss.speaker: Medeus
boss.line: GAHAHA... NAIVE HUMANS... DON'T THINK YOU'VE WON! YOUR NAIVETE... SHALL BE YOUR UNDOING... MY NOBLE THRALLS... BECOME MY FLESH AND BLOOD... GIVE ME YOUR STRENGTH!

boss.speaker: Medeus
boss.line: DO YOU PLAN TO... DEFY ME ONCE MORE... DESCENDANT OF ANRI...?

boss.speaker: Marth
boss.line: No matter how many times you return, mankind will never surrender! This long battle... I will end it here, once and for all!

boss.speaker: Medeus
boss.line: A MERE HUMAN SUCH AS YOURSELF... WISHES TO CHALLENGE ME...? HOW FOOLISH...

boss.speaker: Kris
boss.line: I have come this far, just for this moment. My death means nothing, for Prince Marth will create a bright future for us all...! As long as I have that hope, I'll fight on. I'll come at you with everything I've got!

recruit-battle.speaker: Elice
recruit-battle.line: WE WILL KILL ALL... WHO DEFY... LORD MEDEUS...

recruit-battle.speaker: Maria
recruit-battle.line: WE WILL KILL ALL... WHO DEFY... LORD MEDEUS...

recruit-battle.speaker: Nyna
recruit-battle.line: WE WILL KILL ALL... WHO DEFY... LORD MEDEUS...

recruit-battle.speaker: Lena
recruit-battle.line: WE WILL KILL ALL... WHO DEFY... LORD MEDEUS...
